properties.areaDesc: Marion; Chattahoochee; Harris; Taylor; Muscogee; Talbot; Upson
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 8:11AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 811 AM EST...a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line
extending from Sprewell Bluff State Park to near Fort Benning/lawson
Army Air Fld...and moving east at 40 mph.

HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind...frequent cloud to ground lightning
and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of these storms include
Thomaston, Buena Vista, Talbotton, Cusseta, Woodland, Yatesville,
Junction City, Geneva, North Fort Benning, Sunset Village, Lincoln
Park, Upatoi, Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld, Brantley, Juniper,
Vista Terrace, Jamestown/south Fort Benning, Baughville, Oakland and
Manta.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear
thunder...you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists
should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR CHATTAHOOCHEE...SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS...WESTERN TAYLOR...MARION...UPSON...TALBOT AND EASTERN MUSCOGEE COUNTIES UNTIL 845 AM EST
